response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that this product holds a significant importance to me, reflecting its true worth at $15,000. Considering its immense value to both us and you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a fantastic chance to secure a high-quality item at a competitive price. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial transaction.", "product_price": 12000}
